title: Tabletop RPG COllection
description:
This is a massive collection I have been compiling and am still compiling (cannot find some of the missing books from some of the sets) of various tabletop games. I count 19 tabletops plus some loose chaosium books that only had one or two books. This is a very large file so it may take some time to download so please seed so that others are not suffering.

Games included: 
D&D 3.5
Rifts
Nightbane
Nephilim
Ars Magica
Scion
Hackmaster
Paranoia
Earthdawn
Alternity
Conspiracy X
Pendragon
Call of Cthulhu
Eternal Champions
Geist the sin eaters
Different worlds
Plus assorted games by Chaosium
